name: Jumpn't Knight
description:
A platformer where you can't jump! Escape from the danger of... a dungeon! This is a small game made in 12 hours for the Mini Jam 45: Dungeons with a pocket size resolution! 

I hope you like it!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys - Move..

R - Restart game

That's all...

if you want to support me, please do it! https://www.paypal.me/reyespaz2005
